long_description: The Opsrey Quasar daypack bridges the gap between your work day and after work play. Carry a laptop and papers, or rain gear, extra food and a layer. Main zip compartment offers panel-loading access that opens wide for packing and unpacking and makes it easy to locate gear. Internal stretch-mesh pocket and a document sleeve; laptop sleeve with padded base holds up to a 15 in. laptop. AirScape(TM) back panel with ridged-foam padding offers support and protection; shoulder straps with foam padding and spacer mesh provide cushioning and ventilation. Sternum strap balances load and features a built-in whistle buckle; removable 20mm webbing waist strap. Padded carry handle. Front exterior zip pocket has mini-organizer; small exterior stash pocket has a key fob. Front bungee compression strap lets you quickly stash your jacket or secures an ice tool with the ice tool loop. Osprey Quasar pack has 2 side stretch-mesh pockets for stashing water bottles or an umbrella.
short_description: The Opsrey Quasar daypack bridges the gap between your work day and after work play. Carry a laptop and papers, or rain gear, extra food and a layer.
